page.title: 13Dunchurch Mngment Cntr.Rugby
page.content: Grid ref.489713 The College is owned by the{General {Electric Company.}They run the courses 3 times a year.These are a selection of the courses:-Contract Preperation and Management,Management of Export, commercial negotiation,leadership, finance of exports and management of production.The college employs 73 staff including,Management,Tuturial, Secretarial,Administration,Catering & Domestic.The college is not just open to G.E.C.It is open to other people.It is well sited near motorways & railway lines and is not far from Birmingham Airport.They have enough accomodation for 6 courses with 75 course members. They also have 5 conference rooms. Closed circuit T.V. is available.
